page.title: 03OCCUPATIONS
page.content: We decided to find out were the {heads of the families}worked. If he (as it usually was) worked{inside}the village,{outside}the village or if they were{unemployed (retired).}Twenty seven people worked in the village and seventy six people out of the village and there were seventy one unemployed, sixty eight of these people are retired. All together{174 houses}were {surveyed}which is over half the village. The most unemployed people live in Woodlands because there is a large number of bungalows. Most people who live in Red Barn Lane work in the village.Most people who live in Hamford Drive and Sparrows cornner work outside the village.
